aboutIntro.heading: Our Story
aboutIntro.p1: GS ADVOGADOS is the first law firm established in Angola, structured to deliver fast and effective responses to our clients’ legal needs.
aboutIntro.p2: GS ADVOGADOS brings a seasoned team of lawyers who, practicing with vocation, devote themselves to safeguarding clients’ interests with dedication, insight, and strong professionalism.
aboutIntro.p3: At GS ADVOGADOS, we offer each client comprehensive, individualized, high-level attention. To better serve our clients, we invest in continuous training and the constant development of our legal team.

values.heading: Values
values.lead: GS ADVOGADOS upholds standardized business principles, innovation in quality control, promptness, confidentiality, dynamism, resilience, integrity, harmony, honesty, excellence, client orientation, and team competitiveness as a unifying factor among collaborators, aiming to maximize results and making GS ADVOGADOS the ideal partner for its clients. Among our values, we highlight:

recogSustain.heading: Recognition and sustainability
recogSustain.intro: Over the years, GS Advogados has consolidated its reputation through clients’ trust, legal rigor and the dedication of its team. This recognition reflects the quality of our services and our commitment to effective, innovative legal solutions aligned with social and environmental responsibility.

recognition.title: Recognition
recognition.body: The recognition we have achieved stems from clients’ trust, technical consistency and our team’s ethical commitment. We work to deliver results with promptness, accuracy and transparency.

sustainability.title: Sustainability
sustainability.body: We promote responsible practices that contribute to the community and the environment. We support day-to-day initiatives and projects that generate positive impact.

competenciasPage.heroSubtitle: Where we operate with experience and results.

fiscalAduaneiro.title: Tax & Customs Law
fiscalAduaneiro.desc: Challenges and claims before the tax authority/customs, tariff reclassification, fine reduction and cargo release.

consumidor.title: Consumer Protection
consumidor.desc: Actions against abusive practices, invalid clauses and warranty failures, seeking refunds and damages.

civilComercial.title: Civil & Commercial Litigation
civilComercial.desc: Contract drafting and advocacy in business disputes and civil liability at all instances.

cobranca.title: Debt Collection Litigation
cobranca.desc: Settlements, enforcement and attachments for swift, secure recovery of credits.

penal.title: Criminal Litigation
penal.desc: Defense in investigations and criminal proceedings, focused on economic crimes and penal compliance.

administrativo.title: Public Procurement, PPP & Administrative Litigation
administrativo.desc: Advisory on tenders, challenges, contract execution and PPP structuring with the Administration.

recursosNaturais.title: Natural Resources Law
recursosNaturais.desc: Licensing, local content, operational contracts and sectoral regulatory compliance.

familia.title: Family Law
familia.desc: Agile solutions for divorce, child support, parental regulation and adoption formalization.

medico.title: Medical Law
medico.desc: Expertise and advocacy in negligence claims, with civil and criminal assessment.

desporto.title: Sports Law
desporto.desc: Sports regulation, athletes’ and clubs’ agreements, publicity rights and dispute resolution before federative bodies.

contenciosoAdministrativo.title: Administrative Litigation
contenciosoAdministrativo.desc: Challenges to administrative acts, actions and appeals before the Administration and administrative courts.

condominiarioImobiliario.title: Condominium & Real Estate Law
condominiarioImobiliario.desc: Condominiums, leases, purchase and sale, due diligence and land registry regularisation.

societario.title: Corporate Law
societario.desc: Incorporation, corporate governance, shareholders’ agreements, reorganisations and M&A transactions.

trabalhoSegSocial.title: Labour & Social Security Law
trabalhoSegSocial.desc: Employment contracts, internal policies, disciplinary matters and labour disputes. Social security contributions and benefits.

financeiroBancario.title: Financial & Banking Law
financeiroBancario.desc: Financial regulation, banking contracts, guarantees, payment instruments and compliance in the financial system.

sucessorio.title: Succession Law
sucessorio.desc: Estate planning, probate, partition and inheritance management focused on asset preservation.

competenciasSetores.heroSubtitle: Sectors where we operate with deep expertise and industry insight.

comercialSocietario.desc: Company incorporation, mergers & acquisitions, commercial contracts.

laboralSegSocial.desc: Employment relations, contracts, labour disputes and social security.

fiscalAduaneiro.title: Tax & Customs Law
fiscalAduaneiro.desc: Tax planning, tax litigation and customs matters.

civilContratos.title: Civil Law & Contracts
civilContratos.desc: Obligations, civil liability, leases, purchase and sale.

administrativoRegulatorio.title: Administrative & Regulatory Law
administrativoRegulatorio.desc: Licensing, public procurement and sectoral regulation.

imobiliarioUrbanistico.title: Real Estate & Urban Planning
imobiliarioUrbanistico.desc: Real estate transactions, land registry, land development.

arbitragemRal.title: Arbitration & ADR
arbitragemRal.desc: Mediation and arbitration, domestic and international.

propriedadeIntelectualTec.title: Intellectual Property & Technology
propriedadeIntelectualTec.desc: Trademarks, patents, copyright and data protection.

podcastPage.heroSubtitle: Clips and conversations on Law, business and society.

ep1.title: Clip – Culture in the Brazilian Migration Process
ep1.desc: How culture manifests and transforms in the Brazilian migration process — from migrants’ roots to adaptations in the new territory.

ep2.title: Clip – Code of Conduct vs. Reality
ep2.desc: The gap between what is written in codes of conduct and what happens in practice, reflecting on ethics and contradictions.

ep3.title: Coercive Measures – Guest: Dr. Sérgio Raimundo
ep3.desc: A clear overview of coercive measures: purpose, practical application and impact on justice.
